title: Macedon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the Factional Kill
- Scout a target, determining if they are a Leader
- Gain three names, one of whom is a Leader. (Costs 3 Gold, +2 for each time it’s used)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you attack a leader, your attack is raised to Unstoppable for that night.
- Leaders are considered to be the most significant alignment of a faction (Town Power, Mafia Head, Plant Killing, etc.) In set rolelists with a Good majority, all Good (Killing) roles also count as leaders.
- If you kill a leader, all Civilizations gain a Basic autovest. This doesn’t stack.
- Your scout cannot be fooled by any disguising capabilities.
- When all other leaders have been slain, all Civilizations gain permanent Unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were killed by a Macedonian hypaspist.” (Factional Kill)
“Your target is of little significance. They do not appear important.” (Scout, no leader)
“Your target radiates a powerful authority. They must be a leader!” (Scout, leader)
“A Leader has been slain. You feel stronger!” (Civilizations gaining an autovest)
“All leaders have been slain. The likes of your command are unrivaled.” (Macedon, all leaders killed)
